Alerts.alertRuleDescription: An attempt to disable connection security failed
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: An attempt to disable connection security failed
Alerts.query: Event | where EventID in (1583) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'

Alerts.alertRuleDescription: Cluster network name resource failed to register dynamic updates
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: Cluster network name resource failed to register dynamic updates
Alerts.query: Event | where  EventID in (1578) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'

Alerts.alertRuleDescription: Cluster network name resource failed to register in secure DNS zone because record was already registered and owned
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: Cluster network name resource failed to register in secure DNS zone because record was already registered and owned
Alerts.query: Event | where  EventID in (1576) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'

Alerts.alertRuleDescription: Cluster network name resource failed to register in secure DNS zone because registration was refused
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: Cluster network name resource failed to register in secure DNS zone because registration was refused
Alerts.query: Event | where  EventID in (1580) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'

Alerts.alertRuleDescription: Cluster network name resource failed to update DNS A record
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: Cluster network name resource failed to update DNS A record
Alerts.query: Event | where  EventID in (1579) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'

Alerts.alertRuleDescription: Cluster service has determined that this node does not have the latest copy of cluster configuration data
Alerts.alertRuleDisplayName: Cluster service has determined that this node does not have the latest copy of cluster configuration data
Alerts.query: Event | where  EventID in (1561) and EventLog == 'System' and Source == 'Microsoft-Windows-FailoverClustering'
